summary: Creative problem solver with extensive mental health and I/DD experience; strong analytical, communication and interpersonal skills; 20+ years of management, program development and policy experience; HIV director/case manager background and commitment to proficiency and effectiveness in service delivery.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Greeted customers, determined needs, recommended merchandise, maintained knowledge of sales promotions and payment/security policies; answered questions; liaised with other stores to check merchandise availability; engaged customers in a friendly manner; completed cleaning, stocking and organizing tasks; built relationships to increase repeat business; contributed to team sales goals.

experience.title: Utilization Management Specialist
experience.description: Collected and analyzed program effectiveness data; developed and streamlined systems for monitoring and tracking; documented and investigated complaints and potentially fraudulent claims; demonstrated cultural and linguistic sensitivity; attended monthly staff trainings.

experience.title: Case Manager
experience.description: Developed treatments and casework programs; provided crisis intervention and substance abuse services; interviewed and evaluated clients with safety and risk assessments; referred clients to social services; offered therapeutic services to emotionally disturbed children and adolescents; created strategies for mentally and physically disabled students; attended monthly trainings; documented complaints.

experience.title: Qualified Professional (QMRP)
experience.description: Created strategies to meet the needs of mentally and physically disabled students; conducted safety and risk assessments; maintained regular client contact; investigated suspected cases of abuse; trained in working with Asperger's Syndrome and high functioning autism; supported patients and families coping with severe illness; conducted home visits.

experience.title: Case Manager
experience.description: Developed treatments and casework programs; interviewed and evaluated clients; referred clients to social services; provided therapeutic services and crisis intervention; maintained regular contact with clients; wrote reports and case summaries; coordinated care from pre-admission to post-discharge; trained in working with patients with Asperger's Syndrome and high functioning Autism.

experience.title: Office Manager
experience.description: Developed company personnel policies, standard operating procedures and employee handbooks; conducted new-hire orientations; employment verifications and investigations; built a comprehensive recruiting strategy; developed and enforced policy and procedures; facilitated criminal background checks; offered fair compensation benchmarking; conducted job analysis and evaluations; shadowed employees to accurately describe duties and skills.

experience.title: Director/Office Manager
experience.description: Directed planning, budgeting, vendor selection and quality assurance; recommended process improvements; defined targets and communicated them to teams; monitored timelines; coordinated design meetings across two departments; collected and analyzed program data; conducted home visits; designed educational materials and client satisfaction surveys; coordinated outreach activities.

experience.title: Qualified Professional/Supervisor
experience.description: Attended trainings; provided one-on-one attention to students; developed strategies to meet the needs of mentally and physically disabled students; coordinated patient care from pre-admission to post-discharge; trained in working with Asperger's Syndrome and high functioning Autism.

experience.title: Residence Hall Director- Administrator II
experience.description: Polietely assisted customers; led project implementations; collaborated with departments and clients to achieve results; hired and trained staff.

experience.title: TFN Project Coordinator
experience.description: Directed planning, budgeting and vendor selection; supervised five community agencies; defined targets and coordinated design meetings; implemented tracking processes; collaborated with outside agencies to achieve goals.

experience.title: Case Manager
experience.description: Assessed and counseled clients; collected program data; educated clients about HIV and other STDs; developed a web-based data system for in-house staff and outside stakeholders; coordinated outreach; wrote summaries; managed confidentiality and client satisfaction surveys.

experience.title: WIC/Medical Clerk
experience.description: Answered calls; greeted customers; described products; assisted customers in person and by phone; provided high-level customer experience; liaised between customers, management and sales; resolved inquiries and complaints; supported wide range of customer service tasks.
